description: So far have had no issues. The other reviews write about a subscription but that's simply the subscriptiom from jetbrains that is required anywhere you use rider.

Jetbrains does not have an in-app update-mechanism. I really appreciate the fact, that I can get the latest and greatest version out of the box. The app is not officially maintained by Jetbrains, but the lady who maintains it, is very active.
This does not detect the installation of dotnet core automatically
summary: This does not detect the installation of dotnet core automatically

description: I don't recomment to install this version of Rider because it's broken and won't work with the latest versions of .NET and .NET Core.
summary: Flatpak version doesn't work well with .NET 6 Install

description: Can't detect .NET and doesn't even see the file when choosing manually
i can not detect .NET even manually

Absolutely terrible
 
This app and company expect me to pay a subscription service for a system that is free on Windows. Yeah nope. I'll reconsider my rating if the subscription service is completely gutted and removed. But I'm not giving money to this level of a scam
summary: I'm not paying for a free service

description: If you don't already have mono and dotnet installed you will have to also run `flatpak install org.freedesktop.Sdk.Extension.mono6 org.freedesktop.Sdk.Extension.dotnet8` and `flatpak override --user --env=FLATPAK_ENABLE_SDK_EXT=dotnet6,mono6 com.jetbrains.Rider` to expose them to rider
Wer auf Win mit Visual Studio gewohnt ist zu arbeiten, wird hier mit Rider unter Linux glücklich. Leider ist das Keymapping unter macOS eine Katastrophe aber unter Linux wirklich eine super IDE!
Es un poco pesada, sin embargo es una buena alternativa a visual studio
que es muy util para juntar canciones??????
Can't even open a project, crash when starting a project even with a default configuration and no addons.
